doctor.name: Dr. S.M. Zakir Khaled
doctor.specialty: Cardiothoracic Surgeon(Heart Bypass, Valve Replacement, Ventricular Septal Defect, Varicose Vein)
doctor.workplace: Islami Bank Hospital & Cardiac Center, Mirpur
doctor.info: Dr. S.M. Zakir Khaled is a highly skilled Cardiothoracic Surgeon in Dhaka, specializing in complex procedures such as heart bypass surgery, valve replacement, ventricular septal defect (VSD) repair, and varicose vein treatment. He holds an MBBS degree and an MS in Cardiothoracic Surgery, and currently serves as the Chief Cardiac Surgeon at Islami Bank Hospital & Cardiac Center, Mirpur. Dr. Zakir Khaled is dedicated to the surgical management of cardiovascular and thoracic diseases, providing expert care to patients suffering from conditions like coronary artery disease, heart valve disorders, congenital heart defects, and vascular problems. He consults at Islami Bank Hospital & Cardiac Center, Mirpur, located at Plot # 19-20, Main Road, Section # 7, Pallabi, Mirpur 12, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 10am to 7pm, closed on Fridays.
